talents.desc: Smite deals 25% more damage to Heroes.
talents.name: Purge Evil

talents.desc: Cooldown is lowered by 0.5 seconds for each target hit by Smite.
talents.name: Retribution

talents.desc: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
talents.name: Battle Momentum

talents.desc: Charge target enemy Hero, dealing 60 (+8 per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. While charging, nearby enemies are knocked back and take 30 (+4 per level) damage.
talents.name: Judgment

talents.desc: Enemies that attack you while shielded have their Attack Speed slowed by 50% and Movement Speed slowed by 50% for 2 seconds.
talents.name: Imposing Will

talents.desc: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
talents.name: Blood for Blood

talents.desc: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.
talents.name: Hardened Shield

talents.desc: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
talents.name: Regeneration Master

talents.desc: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.
talents.name: Amplified Healing
